id.comment: Set 1 - Test syntax of Pattern assign (Positive/Negative tests). Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS expr

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, "end")

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS expr

query.querystr: assign a; constant c; Select a pattern a(c, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid expr

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, "a")

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS invalid expr

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a pattern a(s, "d)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS _expr_

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _"d * 10"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS _expr_

query.querystr: assign a; prog_line n; Select a pattern a(n, _"(8 - 4)"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid _expr_

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _""_)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS invalid _expr_

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(a, _1_)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; print pn; Select a pattern a(pn, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS Ident RHS expr

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("b", " b - ( 2 + a )")

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("", "a + 1")

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("e", _"_"_)

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_", "_)

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("c", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS wildcard

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS wildcard RHS invalid _expr_

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS Integer RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(2, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: assign a; variable v, v1; Select v pattern a(v, v1)

id.comment: Pattern assign syntax, LHS synonym RHS Integer

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, 11)

id.comment: Set 2 - Pattern assign at different nesting levels (Algorithmic Tests). Pattern assign nesting, Not nested 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("c", "d * 10")

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Not nested 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("cat", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Nested in if 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("f", _"2"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Nested in if 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "a + 1")

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Nested in while 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("e", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Nested in while 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"cloud - ((7 + (sky)))"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Multiple nested 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("half", _"max / 2"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign nesting, Multiple nested 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("sky", _)

id.comment: Set 3 - Relation tests for Pattern assign (Algorithmic Tests). Relation, Select all assign

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Relation, Expr only appears in if condition

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"varif2 - 4"_)

id.comment: Relation, Expr only appears in while condition

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "varw1")

id.comment: Relation, Full match true 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "(max + min) / 2")

id.comment: Relation, Full match true 2

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, "b * (d * 10)")

id.comment: Relation, Full match false 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "2")

id.comment: Relation, Full match false 2

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, "8 - 4 + 20")

id.comment: Relation, Partial match true 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"sky"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match true 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"3"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match true 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"bus - seats"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match true 4

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"(8 - 4) + (20 - (1 + 3) )"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match false 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"rd"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match false 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"10 % 20"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match false 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"10 / 5"_)

id.comment: Relation, Partial match false 4

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"(cloud - 7) + sky"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of expr 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "a + 1")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of expr 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"8 - 4 + 20"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of expr 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"10 - 6"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of term 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "d * 10")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of term 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"dog % 10"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of term 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"max * 2"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of factor 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "end")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of factor 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"car + bus - seats"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of factor 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"(20 - (1 + 3))"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of 2 expr/term/factor 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "(min + max) / 2")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of 2 expr/term/factor 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"dog % 10 / 5 * x"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of 2 expr/term/factor 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, "b - 2 + a")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of 2 expr/term/factor 4

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"10 % (20 / 4)"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of at least 3 expr/term/factor 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "b * (d * 10)")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of at least 3 expr/term/factor 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"( ( (8 - 4 + 20 - 1 + 3) ) )"_)

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of at least 3 expr/term/factor 3

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, "( (8 - 4) + ( (20 - ( (1 + 3) ) ) ) )")

id.comment: Relation, Pattern is made of at least 3 expr/term/factor 4

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"10 % (20 / 4) + 2"_)

id.comment: Set 4 - Boundary tests for Pattern assign (Boundary tests). Boundary, Non-existent pattern

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _"8 + 3"_)

id.comment: Set 5 - AST tests for Pattern assign, expr AST uses same variables/constant but leaf node order is different. (Algorithmic tests). AST, different order 1

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, "1 + a")

id.comment: AST, different order 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"10 * d"_)

id.comment: AST, different order 3

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"d * 10 * b"_)

id.comment: AST, different order 4

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"cloud - 7 + sky"_)

id.comment: AST, different order 5

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"b / ((10 - 6) * d)"_)

id.comment: AST, different order 6

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"dog % 10 / 5 * x + 3"_)
